mapper.select: select bc.b_comment_num AS commentNum, bc.b_comment_content AS commentContent, bc.b_comment_time AS commentTime, bc.board_num AS boardNum, bc.user_num AS userNum, u.user_id AS userId from b_comment bc join users u on bc.user_num = u.user_num where bc.board_num = #{boardNum} order by bc.b_comment_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into b_comment (b_comment_content, board_num, user_num) values(#{commentContent}, #{boardNum}, #{userNum})
mapper.update: update b_comment set b_comment_content = #{commentContent}, b_comment_time = current_timestamp where b_comment_num = #{commentNum}
mapper.select: select bc.*, u.user_id from b_comment bc join users u on bc.user_num = u.user_num where bc.b_comment_num = #{commentNum}
